summary.body: I'm looking for someone to re-upholster my sofa and dining chair seats - can anyone recommend someone they've used? I also have some cane seated chairs which need re-caning...
summary.subject: Upholsterer anyone?

summary.body: Daft Question: Does anyone know if you can re-do the springs on a sofa, when the cushions cannot be removed? And if so, anybody know who might be able to it? I have a huge leather sofa where all the cushions are "integrated" into the frame, i.e. separate cushions but they are permanently fixed to the frame and structure. I reckon it MIGHT be possible for someone skilled to open up the cushion and strengthen the springs. Any bright ideas or recommendations, neighbours?  ta... Matt
summary.subject: Upholstery Question...

summary.body: I've just bought an old 60s lounge chair, and the seat cushions need recovering. Does anyone know of anybody nearby that could do this? Thanks.
summary.subject: Anyone know a good upholsterer?
